thread.title: Over 1 Three customers suffering network outage
thread.title_full: Over 1 Three customers suffering network outage

title: Over 1 Three customers suffering network outage
text:
Over 100,000 Three customers suffering network outage 
Independent.ie Saturday 24th October, 2015 
Comments Customers have been flooding the company's Twitter page with complaints reporting loss of signal throughout the country. 
The outage began at around 1pm this afternoon.The company said on its Twitter page: "We're aware of the situation and our engineers are working to resolve it as quickly as possible." 
A spokesperson for Three told Independent.ie that the problem is affecting 5-6pc of its customers.Three engineers have diagnosed the problem and are hoping to restore service to affected customers shortly. 
...
